title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1260.41 - Open fires restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1260.41 - Open fires restricted

State Regulations

No person shall start any open fires of any type, including flare pots, torches or fires in containers formerly used for oil, paint, and similar materials on any part of an air terminal without
permission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1260.41

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
